``` ::: column-screen ::: hero-banner ::: content-block # 2024 Annual Conference of the American Psychology-Law Society ### Los Angeles, California \| March 21-23, 2024 ::: hero-buttons [Register Now](https://apls.memberclicks.net/24conferencereg#!/){#btn-guide .btn-action .btn-action .btn .btn-success role="button"} [Learn More](#register){.btn-action .btn .btn-secondary role="button"} ::: ::: ::: ::: ::: simple-info ::: {.content-block .col-v-center} ## Get Ready for APLS 2024! ::: ::: grid ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6 .col-v-center} The 2024 APLS Conference will be held at The Westin Bonaventure Hotel and Suites in Los Angeles, California from March 21-23. [Add to Calender](https://www.addevent.com/event/My18398113){.btn-action-primary .btn-action .btn .btn-primary role="button"} ::: ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6 .col-v-center} ![](images/2024_announcement.png){width="300"} ::: ::: ::: ::: column-screen ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}

``` ::: ::: ::: # General Information {#info} ::: {.panel-tabset .box-shadow} ## {{< fa calendar >}} Important Dates ### Important Dates **Proposals due:** ~~October 2, 2023~~ [deadline extended to October 9, 2023!!!]{style="color: red;"} **Reviewer sign-up ends:** October 13, 2023 **Review of abstracts due:** November 2, 2023 **Early bird-registration ends**: January 31, 2024 ## {{< fa circle-user >}} Conference Organizers ::: {.callout-note appearance="simple"} #### Conference Co-Chairs Caitlin Cavanagh, Ph.D.
Samantha Zottola, Ph.D. #### Questions? If you have any other questions, please contact: {{< fa envelope title="Email" >}} {{< var email.conference >}} {{< fa envelope title="Email" >}} {{< var email.office >}} ::: ## {{< fa person-running >}} Fun Run ::: simple-info ##### Explore Los Angeles with colleagues on a 5k Fun Run, sponsored by the AP-LS Student Committee! ### Friday, March 22, 2024 ::: callout-note #### **MEET IN LOBBY OF THE CONFERENCE HOTEL AT 7:00 AM** REFRESHMENTS WILL BE PROVIDED AFTER THE RACE [COST: TBD]{.badge .bg-warning} ***Funds raised are used to support student committee conference awards*** ::: ::: ## Student Volunteer Interest Students are eligible to receive complimentary conference registration by volunteering to serve as staff during the annual conference. **To apply:** 1. Submit a letter of intent to serve on official letterhead from your program chair, department head, or faculty to {{< fa envelope title="Email" >}} {{< var email.office >}} that includes the following statement: | *"This letter of intent is made with the full understanding that \[insert student name here\] will volunteer as staff support for the AP-LS 2024 conference for which the registration scholarship has been awarded. Failure to serve will not only void the scholarship but will jeopardize future requests. Should I attend the conference and fail to serve, payment in full of applicable fees will be rendered to AP-LS upon request."* 2. All Submissions are due **November 24th, 2023** and will be reviewed and accepted by **November 30th**. If you are accepted you will receive a discount code for registration. We highly recommend waiting to register until receiving this discount code as refunds can often take some time. :::
::: vspace ::: # Call for Proposals {#cfp} ::: {.panel-tabset .box-shadow} ## {{< fa bullhorn >}} 2024 Call for Proposals ### APLS 2024 Call for Proposals Proposal submissions for the 2024 APLS Conference are now closed. ## {{< fa user-pen >}} Call for Reviewers If you signed up to review submission for the 2024 AP-LS annual conference you should have received an email with the link to complete your reviews. The deadline for review of abstracts is the **Thursday, 2nd November 2023**. ::: {.callout-note appearance="simple"} We would be extremely grateful if you could complete your reviews before the deadline so that we can issue our notification to authors without delay. If you have any questions about the process or your review allocation, please contact {{< fa envelope title="Email" >}} {{< var email.conference >}} ::: ::: ::: vspace :::
::: vspace ::: ::: column-screen ::: {.simple-info-blue .alt-background-blue} ::: content-block-blue ### Not sure what to expect at the APLS annual conference? The 2023 APLS Annual Conference schedule and program is available to download and view online [Learn more {{< fa arrow-right >}}](archive/2023/schedule.html){.btn-action .btn .btn-secondary .btn-lg role="button"} ::: ::: ::: ::: vspace ::: ::: {simple-info} # Hotel Information {#hotel} ::: {.panel-tabset .box-shadow} ## The Westin Bonaventure Hotel and Suites ![](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/3/3a/Westin_Bonaventure_Hotel.jpg){fig-align="center" height="300"} > The 2024 AP-LS Conference will be held at the [The Westin Bonaventure Hotel and Suites](https://www.marriott.com/en-us/hotels/laxbw-the-westin-bonaventure-hotel-and-suites-los-angeles/overview/) ### Conference Rates AP-LS has rooms set aside for all attendees, which can be booked at a special group rate that is available for attendees: {{< fa credit-card >}} Group Rate \$249
{{< fa calendar >}} Available March 19 - March 24
{{< fa square-parking >}} Discounted Valet Parking (\$38/ night) Attendees must book their room by **February 25th, 2024** to take advantage of the special rate! ::: hero-buttons [{{< fa bell-concierge >}} Book a Room](https://www.marriott.com/event-reservations/reservation-link.mi?id=1698166662825&key=GRP&app=resvlink){.btn-action .btn .btn-info .ml-auto role="button"} [{{< fa hotel >}} Website](https://goo.gl/maps/p6PCdg1nZ46NASuw9){.btn-action .btn .btn-dark .ml-auto role="button"} ::: ## {{< fa plane >}} Plan your trip For attendees flying in to Los Angeles, the LAX FlyAway runs from LAX to the Union Station train station in downtown LA and is $10. The LAX FlyAway runs from LAX every 30 minutes and from Union Station every hour. Union Station is a short Uber or cab ride to the hotel but is a great option for individuals arriving alone as Ubers and cabs directly from the airport can be costly. ::: hero-buttons [{{< fa map-location-dot >}} Get Directions](https://goo.gl/maps/p6PCdg1nZ46NASuw9){.btn-action .btn .btn-info .ml-auto role="button"} ::: ::: :::
::: vspace ::: ::: {simple-info} # Registration {#register} ::: {.panel-tabset .box-shadow} ## {{< fa circle-info >}} Registration is open! We encourage you to register before January 31st to take advantage of the early bird pricing! [Register Now {{< fa arrow-up-right-from-square >}} ](https://apls.memberclicks.net/24conferencereg#!/){.btn-action .btn .btn-primary .ml-auto role="button"} :::vspace ::: ::: {.callout-note appearance="simple"} ## REGISTRATION RATES & INCLUSIONS \*Rates may be subject to change +-----------------------------------------+-----------------+---------------+ | Status | Early Bird\ | Regular\ | | | (before Jan 31) | (on Feb 1) | +:========================================+:================+:==============+ | Full Member | \$285 | \$315 | +-----------------------------------------+-----------------+---------------+ | Early Career Professional Member | \$205 | \$235 | | | | | +-----------------------------------------+-----------------+---------------+ | Student Member | \$80 | \$110 | +-----------------------------------------+-----------------+---------------+ | Student Member *First-Author Presenter* | \$40 | \$40 | +-----------------------------------------+-----------------+---------------+ | Student Non-member | \$140 | \$170 | +-----------------------------------------+-----------------+---------------+ | Non-member | \$380 | \$450 | +-----------------------------------------+-----------------+---------------+ ::: ::: :::
::: vspace ::: ::: {simple-info} # Preconference Workshops {#preconference} ::: {.panel-tabset .box-shadow} ## {{< fa bullhorn >}} Info At this year's conference we are excited to offer 2 full day workshops and 4 half day workshops on that will take place on **Wednesday March 20**. Attendees will have the ability to register for the pre conference workshops with their conference registration. ## {{< fa circle-info >}} Pricing ::: callout-note ## REGISTRATION RATES & INCLUSIONS \*Pricing is subject to change ### Full-Day Workshop Rates +--------------------+-----------------+----------------+ | Status | Early Bird\ | Regular\ | | | (before Jan 31) | (on Feb 1) | +:===================+:================+:===============+ | Member | \$200 | \$230 | +--------------------+-----------------+----------------+ | Non-Member | \$250 | \$280 | +--------------------+-----------------+----------------+ | Student Member | \$80 | \$100 | +--------------------+-----------------+----------------+ | Student Non-member | \$100 | \$120 | +--------------------+-----------------+----------------+ | | | | +--------------------+-----------------+----------------+ ### Half-Day Workshop Rates +--------------------+-----------------+----------------+ | Status | Early Bird\ | Regular\ | | | (before Jan 31) | (on Feb 1) | +:===================+:================+:===============+ | Member | \$100 | \$115 | +--------------------+-----------------+----------------+ | Non-Member | \$125 | \$140 | +--------------------+-----------------+----------------+ | Student Member | \$40 | \$50 | +--------------------+-----------------+----------------+ | Student Non-member | \$50 | \$60 | +--------------------+-----------------+----------------+ ::: ::: :::
::: vspace ::: ::: simple-info # Schedule Overview {#schedule} ::: {.panel-tabset .box-shadow} ## Preconference ### Wednesday, March 20, 2024 Pre-conference sessions throughout the day [Learn More {{< fa arrow-right >}}](#preconference){.btn-action .btn .btn-primary .btn-lg role="button"} ## Day 1 (Thurs) ### Thursday, March 21, 2024 *More information available soon.* ## Day 2 (Fri) ### Friday, March 22, 2024 *More information available soon.* ## Day 3 (Sat) ### Saturday, March 23, 2024 *More information available soon.* ::: \*Program is subject to change :::
